# Robustness Diagram

Elements for robustness analysis diagrams, commonly used in OOAD (Object-Oriented Analysis and Design) to bridge use cases and class diagrams.

---

## Boundary

<picture>
  <source media="(prefers-color-scheme: dark)" srcset="./boundary-dark.svg">
  <source media="(prefers-color-scheme: light)" srcset="./boundary.svg">
  <img alt="Boundary" src="./boundary.svg">
</picture>

<details>
<summary>Copy/paste snippet</summary>

```html
<meta charset="utf-8"><div data-tldraw="">{"type":"application/tldraw","kind":"content","version":3,"data":{"assets":[],"otherCompressed":""}}</div>
```

</details>

## Use Case

<picture>
  <source media="(prefers-color-scheme: dark)" srcset="./use-case-dark.svg">
  <source media="(prefers-color-scheme: light)" srcset="./use-case.svg">
  <img alt="Use Case" src="./use-case.svg">
</picture>

<details>
<summary>Copy/paste snippet</summary>

```html
<meta charset='utf-8'><html><head></head><body><div data-tldraw="">{"type":"application/tldraw","kind":"content","version":3,"data":{"assets":[],"otherCompressed":""}}</div></body></html>
```

</details>
